by  Mark HeisePublished  February  

Coming off two strong performances at home the Minnesota mens gymnastics team hopes to take its success on the road this weekend traveling to Iowa to face the Hawkeyes on Sunday at  p.m PERIOD

I think we feel pretty confident going in even on the road freshman Cole Storer said PERIOD I think we should be able to keep it together. the seventhranked Gophers could be up against a challenge as No PERIOD  Iowa has consistently broken the 200point barrier this season PERIOD

To go to Iowa with these two big home wins on our shoulders should make things a lot easier for us sophomore Adam Reichow said PERIOD Everyone knows if we just take care of our end well be in good shape. women to Arizona

Minnesota travels to Arizona to face the 15thranked Wildcats Friday at  p.m PERIOD CST PERIOD
